content: lh needle ssk turn co cast on row 2 sl1 p5 wrap & turn k knit row 3 k5 ssk turn k2tog knit 2 stitches together row 4 p5 wrap & turn lh left hand row 5 k4 ssk turn p purl row 6 p4 wrap & turn pu pick up rh right hand row 7 k3 ssk turn round s round s row 8 p3 wrap & turn sl slip row 9 k2 ssk turn ssk slip the next 2 sts knitwise one at a time knit these 2 sts together row 10 p2 wrap & turn st s stitch es row 11 k1 ssk turn ambiente colors row 12 p1 wrap & turn at left row 13 ssk do not turn 2208 & 2205 repeat row 1 - 13 11 12 x part ix - top decreases note if desired wind through the ball to choose a color with which to finish top of hat 2184 & 2183 round 1 place marker knit rnds 2 & 4 *k6 sl1 repeat from * to end of round skacel collection increase copyright© 2015 - all rights reserved www skacelknitting com article #21100639 05/27/2015
